page.title: 15BROWNIES IN SANDHILLS.
page.content: The thing we like best about brownies was when we went on pack holidays to Hill End camp and Marlborough.We did things like treasure hunts and when a six found the treasure they shared it out.We did art and craft as well.Once we made a plasticine ship in a bottle.Each group had a different duty to do. They were waitreses,cooks and messengers.The cooks cooked breakfast,dinner and tea.We always had a three course meal,the waitrsses laid the table and cleard up afterwards.The messangers drew up a weather chart and brownies own which is saying prayers and always sang a song. We always had a midnight feast.On the last night we did a play on whatever our theme was.When we wern't on pack holiday we do things like sponsered silences and lots of different sports as well.
